CustomField.formula: npsp__MailingStreet__c & BR() & npsp__MailingStreet2__c & IF(ISBLANK(npsp__MailingStreet2__c), "", BR()) & npsp__MailingCity__c & IF(ISBLANK(npsp__MailingCity__c), "", ", ") & npsp__MailingState__c & " " & npsp__MailingPostalCode__c & IF(ISBLANK(npsp__MailingCountry__c), "", BR() & npsp__MailingCountry__c)
CustomField.label: Mailing Address
